name: Gladiator (itch) (Srybe, SupaDruide)
description:
Gladiator :

In this brawler, your objective is to kill 5 enemies in the arena by using your hammer and your shield to protect yourself. You can also use an ultimate ability that will deal damage to every enemy.

Controls :

You can play with a keyboard and mouse or with a controller.

Controls Keyboard and Mouse: 

  • Move : WASD
  • Turn the camera : Mouse
  • Attack : Left mouse button
  • Shield : Right mouse button
  • Ultimate : R
  • Lock/Unlock an enemy : Shift
  • Change Lock : Mouse wheel

Controls Gamepad: 

  • Move : Left stick
  • Turn the camera : Right Stick
  • Attack : Right trigger
  • Shield : Left trigger
  • Ultimate : Face button bottom
  • Lock/Unlock an enemy : Right stick button
  • Change Lock : Right shoulder
